workItem.name: БД. Задача на автоматическое обновление datastore.LastMERInfos

workItemFields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps: <steps id="0" last="6"><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Открыть БД  task_manager таблица "Tasks"<BR/><BR/>Выполнить запрос:<BR/></P><P style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)"><SPAN style="color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-weight: bold">SELECT</SPAN> * <SPAN style="color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-weight: bold">FROM</SPAN> task_manager.<SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 128)">"Tasks"</SPAN></P><P><SPAN style="font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px;color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-weight: bold">where</SPAN><SPAN style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px"> </SPAN><SPAN style="font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px;color: rgb(0, 0, 128)">"Code"</SPAN><SPAN style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px"> = </SPAN><SPAN style="font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px;color: rgb(0, 128, 0)">'updatelastmerinfos'<BR/><BR/></SPAN><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><FONT color="#000000"><SPAN style="font-size: 14px">В таблице task_manager.Tasks создана задача на автоматическое обновление последних МЭР с параметрами:</SPAN></FONT><BR/></P><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 14px"><BR/></DIV><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 14px"><TABLE width="" style="font-family: Calibri;font-size: 11pt"><TBODY><TR style="height: 14.25pt"><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">Name</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">Code</TD><TD style="width: 123px;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">Description</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">ServiceName</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">CronExpression</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">Enabled</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">Parameters</TD></TR><TR style="height: 14.25pt"><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">updatelastmerinfos</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">updatelastmerinfos</TD><TD style="vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">Обновление последнего МЭР</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">DataStore</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">0 5 3-10 * *</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)">true</TD><TD style="width: 48pt;vertical-align: bottom;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0)"></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE></DIV><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="5" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Перейти в БД task_manager в таблицу "TasksProcessingEvents"<BR/><BR/></P><P>Выполнить запрос:<BR/><SPAN style="font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-weight: bold">SELECT</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)"> * </SPAN><SPAN style="font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-weight: bold">FROM</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)"> task_manager.</SPAN><SPAN style="font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);color: rgb(0, 0, 128)">"TasksProcessingEvents"</SPAN><BR/></P><DIV style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);padding: 0px 0px 0px 2px"><P><SPAN style="color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;font-weight: bold">where</SPAN><FONT color="#000000" face="Consolas"><SPAN style="font-size: 10pt"> </SPAN></FONT><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 128);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt">"TaskId"</SPAN><FONT color="#000000" face="Consolas"><SPAN style="font-size: 10pt"> = </SPAN></FONT><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt">'' </SPAN><FONT color="#008000" face="Consolas"><SPAN style="font-size: 13.3333px">--id таски можно получить выполнив запрос из шага 1</SPAN></FONT><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt"><BR/></SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;font-weight: bold">order</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(232, 242, 254)"> </SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;font-weight: bold">by</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(232, 242, 254)"> </SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 128);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt">"Date"</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(232, 242, 254)"> </SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(128, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;font-weight: bold">desc</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(232, 242, 254)"> </SPAN></P></DIV><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>В результате запроса есть записи с периодом дат по условию:<BR/>3 &lt;= 'Тек. дата' &lt;= 10:<BR/>&nbsp;<BR/>В колонке "Status" значение 0<BR/><IMG src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""/><BR/><BR/><B>Пример:<BR/></B>Если сегодня 7 число, в результате запроса будут записи с датой начиная с 3 по 7 число месяца</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="6" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Перейти в логи data_store<BR/><BR/><A href="https://console.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/k8s/ns/u210001901/deployments/spektr-datastore" tabindex="-1">spektr-datastore · Details · OKD (gazprom-neft.local)<BR/><BR/></A>Найти лог от 5 утра*<BR/><BR/>* по ТЗ таска стартует в 5 утра<BR/></P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Задача стартует и завершается, в логах нет ошибок level: "Fatal"<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>

workItem.name: БД. Проверка получения только согласованных ТР ДОБ и НАГ фонда

workItemFields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps:
<steps id="0" last="9"><step id="6" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Получить выгрузку данных из KLAD по запросу:<BR/><BR/>Для ДОБ фонда:<BR/></P><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt">select f_op.id,</DIV><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt">...<DIV><BR/></DIV><DIV>from dm_udh_prod5.t_facility_op f_op</DIV><DIV>left join dm_udh_prod5.facility_state fs2 on fs2.id = f_op.facility_state_id</DIV><DIV>left join dm_udh_prod5.layer l on l.id = f_ops.layer_id</DIV><DIV>join (select * from (VALUES @wellIdsValueStr)vals)tt on tt.column1 = f_op.facility_id</DIV><DIV>where f_op.begin_date is not null and f_op.source = 'oil'</DIV>and f_op.begin_date &gt;= @dBeginDate and f_op.begin_date &lt;= @dEndDate"</DIV><P><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(0, 255, 0)">​</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(0, 255, 0)">and f_op.flag_confirm = true</SPAN>&nbsp;<BR/><BR/><BR/>Для НАГ фонда:<BR/></P><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 14px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)">select</DIV><P><BR/></P><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 14px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)"><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; f_op.id,<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ...</DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; from dm_udh_prod5.t_facility_op f_op<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; left join dm_udh_prod5.facility_state fs2 on fs2.id = f_op.facility_state_id<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; inner join dm_udh_prod5.layer l on l.id = f_ops.layer_id<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; join (select * from (VALUES @wellIdsValueStr)vals)tt on tt.column1 = f_op.facility_id<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; where f_op.begin_date is not null and f_op.source = 'inj'<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; and f_op.begin_date &gt;= @dBeginDate and f_op.begin_date &lt;= @dEndDate"<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<SPAN style="background-color: rgb(0, 255, 0)">and f_op.flag_confirm = true</SPAN></DIV></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Есть результат запроса<BR/><BR/>* полный запрос во вложении<BR/><BR/>&nbsp;<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Обновить ТР ДОБ фонда:<BR/>curl --location --request POST 'https://datastore-swagger-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/datastore/v1/TechMode/showcase?reportingMonth=2025-03-01'<BR/><BR/>* в <SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))">reportingMonth= передать месяц загрузки ТР<BR/><BR/></SPAN><SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))">Выполнить запрос в БД data_store."Operations":</SPAN></P>SELECT * FROM data_store."Operations"
WHERE "OperationInfoId" = 1
PRDER BY "OperationStartDate" DESC</DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Задача успешно завершена*<BR/><BR/>* в "OperationStatusId" = 3</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Выполнить запрос в БД data_store."TechModes":<BR/>SELECT * FROM data_store."TechModes"<BR/><SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))">WHERE "OrgId" = '@id организации'</SPAN>
</P>AND "ReportingMonth" = '@ месяц проекта'<BR/>AND "IsOtherFund" is false<BR/><DIV><BR/></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Кол-во записей в БД == кол-ву записей из выгрузки</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Обновить ТР НАГ фонда:<BR/>curl --location --request POST 'https://datastore-swagger-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/v1/InjectionFund?orgIds=6&amp;orgIds=8&amp;orgIds=9&amp;orgIds=10&amp;orgIds=13&amp;orgIds=2&amp;orgIds=7&amp;orgIds=1&amp;orgIds=5&amp;startDate=2024-12-01&amp;endDate=2024-12-31''<BR/><BR/>* в <SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))">orgIds= передать id организации</SPAN><SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))"> </SPAN></P><P>&nbsp; в startDate=<SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))"> передать месяц загрузки ТР<BR/><BR/></SPAN><SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))">Выполнить запрос в БД data_store."Operations":</SPAN></P><P>SELECT * FROM data_store."Operations"
WHERE "OperationInfoId" = 14
PRDER BY "OperationStartDate" DESC<BR/></P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Задача успешно завершена*<BR/><BR/>* в "OperationStatusId" = 3<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="5" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Выполнить запрос в БД data_store."InjectionFund":<BR/>SELECT * FROM data_store."InjectionFund"
WHERE "OrgId" = '@id организации'
AND "ReportingMonth" = '@ месяц проекта'<BR/>AND "IsOtherFund" is false</P></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Кол-во записей в БД == кол-ву записей из выгрузки<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="7" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Получить выгрузку данных из KLAD по запросу:<BR/><BR/>&nbsp;<SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))">Для ДОБ фонда:</SPAN><BR/></P><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt">select f_op.id,</DIV><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt">...<DIV><BR/></DIV><DIV>from dm_udh_prod5.t_facility_op f_op</DIV><DIV>left join dm_udh_prod5.facility_state fs2 on fs2.id = f_op.facility_state_id</DIV><DIV>left join dm_udh_prod5.layer l on l.id = f_ops.layer_id</DIV><DIV>join (select * from (VALUES @wellIdsValueStr)vals)tt on tt.column1 = f_op.facility_id</DIV><DIV>where f_op.begin_date is not null and f_op.source = 'oil'</DIV>and f_op.begin_date &gt;= @dBeginDate and f_op.begin_date &lt;= @dEndDate"</DIV><P><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(0, 255, 0)">​</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt;background-color: rgb(0, 255, 0)">and f_op.flag_confirm = false</SPAN>&nbsp;<BR/><BR/><BR/>Для НАГ фонда:<BR/></P><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 14px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)">select</DIV><P><BR/></P><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-size: 14px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)"><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; f_op.id,<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ...</DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; from dm_udh_prod5.t_facility_op f_op<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; left join dm_udh_prod5.facility_state fs2 on fs2.id = f_op.facility_state_id<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; inner join dm_udh_prod5.layer l on l.id = f_ops.layer_id<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; join (select * from (VALUES @wellIdsValueStr)vals)tt on tt.column1 = f_op.facility_id<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; where f_op.begin_date is not null and f_op.source = 'inj'<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; and f_op.begin_date &gt;= @dBeginDate and f_op.begin_date &lt;= @dEndDate"<BR/></DIV><DIV>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<SPAN style="background-color: rgb(0, 255, 0)">and f_op.flag_confirm = false</SPAN></DIV></DIV></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Есть результат запроса<BR/><BR/>* полный запрос во вложении<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="8" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Выполнить запрос в БД data_store."TechModes":<BR/>SELECT * FROM data_store."TechModes"<BR/><SPAN style="background-color: rgba(var(--palette-primary-tint-40,239, 246, 252),1);color: var(--text-primary-color,rgba(0, 0, 0, .9))">WHERE "OrgId" = '@id организации'</SPAN>
</P><P>AND "ReportingMonth" = '@ месяц проекта'<BR/></P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>В БД нет записей из выгрузки<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="9" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Выполнить запрос в БД data_store."InjectionFund":<BR/>SELECT * FROM data_store."InjectionFund"
WHERE "OrgId" = '@id организации'
AND "ReportingMonth" = '@ месяц проекта'<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>В БД нет записей из выгрузки<BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>

workItemFields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Parameters: <parameters><param name="id" bind="default"/><param name="wellIdsValueStr" bind="default"/><param name="dBeginDate" bind="default"/><param name="dEndDate" bind="default"/></parameters>

workItem.name: БД. task_manager.Tasks. Изменение передаваемого периода при запуске таски для загрузки ТРов НАГ фонда

workItemFields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps:
<steps id="0" last="3"><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Перейти в БД <SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)">data_store</SPAN><SPAN style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)">.</SPAN><SPAN style="font-family: Consolas;font-size: 13.3333px;background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);color: rgb(0, 0, 128)">"Operations"</SPAN><BR/>Выполнить запрос:<BR/></P><DIV style="background-color:#ffffff;padding:0px 0px 0px 2px"><DIV style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);font-family: Consolas;font-size: 10pt"><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">SELECT</SPAN> a.<SPAN style="color:#000080">"Id"</SPAN>, <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationInfoId"</SPAN>, b.<SPAN style="color:#000080">"Description"</SPAN>, <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationStatusId"</SPAN>, <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationStartDate"</SPAN>, <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationEndDate"</SPAN>, <SPAN style="color:#000080">"ErrorDetails"</SPAN></P><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">FROM</SPAN> data_store.<SPAN style="color:#000080">"Operations"</SPAN> a <SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">left</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">join</SPAN> data_store.<SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationInfo"</SPAN> b</P><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">ON</SPAN> a.<SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationInfoId"</SPAN> = b.<SPAN style="color:#000080">"Id"</SPAN></P><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">WHERE</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationStatusId"</SPAN> != <SPAN style="color:#0000ff">3</SPAN></P><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">and</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationInfoId"</SPAN> = <SPAN style="color:#0000ff">14</SPAN></P><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">and</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#000080">"ErrorDetails"</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">is</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">not</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">null</SPAN></P><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">and</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationStartDate"</SPAN> &gt; <SPAN style="color:#008000">'гггг-мм-дд'</SPAN> --передать дату (тек дата - <SPAN style="color:#0000ff">2</SPAN> дня)</P><P><SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">order</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">by</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#000080">"OperationStartDate"</SPAN> <SPAN style="color:#800000;font-weight:bold">desc</SPAN></P></DIV></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>В результате запроса 0 записей</P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Перейти в логи:<BR/>https://console.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/k8s/ns/u210001901/deployments/spektr-datastore/pods<BR/><BR/>Найти запись формата:<BR/><BR/>{ "Log_date": "2025-08-20 00:45:06.1917", "level": "Info", "well": "ANY", "message": "Запрос перечня ТР-ов за период <B><I>дата начала </I></B>- <I><B>дата конца</B></I>.", "company": "ANY", "ms": "ANY", "class":
